rules.description: Sets the case recordtype customer service
rules.formula: And(And(And(And(OR(CONTAINS(Owner:User.UserRole.Name, "(CS)"), Contains(Owner:Queue.QueueName,"Customer Service")),NOT(Contains( RecordType.Name ,"Finding Inches"))),NOT(Contains( RecordType.Name ,"Business Systems"))),Not(Contains( RecordType.Name, "EUTF"))),Not(Contains(Text(Status),"Imaging")))

rules.formula: And(And(And(And (OR(CONTAINS(Owner:User.UserRole.Name, "(ES)"), Contains(Owner:Queue.QueueName,"Enrollment Service"), CONTAINS(Owner:User.UserRole.Name, "Sales Support")), NOT(Contains( RecordType.Name ,"Finding Inches"))),NOT(Contains( RecordType.Name ,"Business Systems"))),Not(Contains(RecordType.Name,"EDI"))),Not(Contains(RecordType.Name,"Enrollment Services")))

rules.description: Switch case to Group Underwriting if Group Underwriting person and not GU case
rules.formula: And(CONTAINS(Owner:User.UserRole.Name, "(GU)"), NOT(Contains( RecordType.Name ,"Central Records")), NOT(Contains( RecordType.Name ,"Business Systems")))

rules.description: Switch case to Claims Intake if Claims person and not claims case
rules.formula: And(And(And(And(And(CONTAINS(Owner:User.UserRole.Name, "(HI Claims)"), NOT(Contains( RecordType.Name ,"Finding Inches"))), NOT(Contains( RecordType.Name ,"Central Records"))), NOT(Contains( RecordType.Name ,"Business Systems"))), Not(Contains(RecordType.Name,"EUTF"))), NOT (Contains(RecordType.Name,"Claims")))

rules.description: Sets the case recordtype Service Intake
rules.formula: And(And(And(And(OR(CONTAINS(Owner:User.UserRole.Name, "(MUR)"), Contains(Owner:Queue.QueueName,"Medical Underwriting")),NOT(Contains( RecordType.Name ,"Finding Inches"))),NOT(Contains( RecordType.Name ,"Business Systems"))),Not(Contains( RecordType.Name, "EUTF"))),Not(Contains(Text(Status),"Imaging")))

rules.description: Switch case to Group Partner Service
rules.formula: And(Or(Contains( Case_Owner_Name__c,"Partner Service"), CONTAINS(Owner:User.UserRole.Name, "(Partner Service)")), NOT(Contains( RecordType.Name ,"Partner Service")), NOT(Contains( RecordType.Name ,"Business Systems")),NOT(Contains( RecordType.Name ,"Central Records")),NOT(Contains( RecordType.Name ,"Policy Services")),NOT(Contains( RecordType.Name ,"Benefits Admin")))

rules.description: set case record type to policy Services record type
rules.formula: And(And(And(OR(OR(CONTAINS(Owner:User.UserRole.Name, "(PS)"), Contains(Owner:Queue.QueueName,"New Business")), Contains(Owner:Queue.QueueName,"Amendments")),NOT(Contains( RecordType.Name ,"Finding Inches"))),NOT(Contains( RecordType.Name ,"Business Systems"))),NOT(Contains(TEXT( Status) ,"Imaging")))
